elements.content: You are now ready for the Demo Training Session!

elements.title: For each short story:
bullets: Try to really imagine yourself in the situation described â€“ use the picture to help you!
Try to picture yourself responding in the way the situation describes, even if you usually react in a different way.

At the end of the story, you'll be presented with one of three types of questions: A missing letter exercise, a complete-the-sentence exercise, or a fill-in-the-blank exercise. For the missing letter, you'll need to select the missing letter tile that completes the incomplete word. For the complete-the-sentence, you'll need to select the ending that best completes the scenario. For the fill-in-the-blank, you'll need to type the word that best completes the sentence.
Respond to the question about the story. Answer correctly on your first try to receive half a point!
